articles.author: Amy Kazmin
articles.title: Italy waters down bank windfall tax - Financial Times
articles.description: ECB had warned the move by Giorgia Meloni’s government risked making lenders more vulnerable to a downturn
articles.content: Italy is further diluting its windfall tax on banks with a new clause giving lenders an alternative to paying the levy, a concession to critics of the measure that include the European Central Bank.… [+2784 chars]
